price: 17. Is then He, Who creates as one who creates not? Will you not then remember?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
